skillTree.localised_description: Whether Beorg strides forth to meet his enemies, or stands expecting their strongest warriors to come forth, those with him are utterly convinced of bloody victory.

effects.description: Leadership: +10
Ability: "Stand Your Ground!"

skillTree.localised_description: Who needs a cumbersome blade when the perfect weapon is literally at your fingertips?

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +45

skillTree.localised_description: Maybe it is the near-constant state of regeneration that gives the hide a toughened sheen, almost impervious to claw, talon or blade.

effects.description: Armour: +15
Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Though he fights with heedless abandon, the furore of battle hones Beorg’s instincts to ensure the blood of his enemies spills more copiously than his own.

effects.description:
Replenishes 15% campaign movement range after winning a battle
	(Lord)
Ability: "Thrill of Battle"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: Though only Beorg carries the full shape of the bear, his kinsmen are also known for occasionally sprouting claws, snarling teeth, mane-like fur and bear-shaped muzzles.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Consumed by unholy bloodlust, these Chaos-tainted madmen have sown terror across a thousand battlefields for the esteem of their Gods and, of course, the sheer *love* of it all.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: By the time one recognises Beorg's war cry, it is already too late.

effects.description: Attribute: Glorious Charge

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +20
Ability: "War Cry"

skillTree.localised_description: Beorg cares little for the so-called ’civilised’ world, but he nevertheless appreciates the fruits of civilisation's labour as he devours them.

effects.description:
Income from post-battle loot: +30%
	(accompanying Lord)

Income from raiding: +50%
	(Hero's army)

Income from looting, sacking and razing settlements +25%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: The greatest of bears is endlessly savage, the Ursfjordlings know, for they regard their Chieftain as living proof of the greatest ursine bloodline.

effects.description: Attacks cause "Rattled" effect, reducing combat ability
Hit points: +30%
Unit mass: +50%

skillTree.localised_description: Many are the dark horrors of twisted flesh and nightmares made real that the Ruinous Powers have visited upon the world, but few are quite as vicious.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6
Charge bonus: +16
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +3
Armour: +8
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +3
Melee defence: +7
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Don't go anywhere near its mouth - in fact, don't even get within snapping distance if you value your limbs.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3
Melee attack: +7
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5%
Weapon strength: +12%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.

effects.description: Hit points: +6%
Hit points: +16%
Hit points: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +4
Leadership: +8
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Blink and you die.

effects.description: Speed: +5%
Speed: +10%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

effects.description: Ability: "Colossal Strike"

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Heed the howl of the Werekin! For vicious slaughter and bloody ruin are soon to follow!

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10%
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A stalker of men and beasts alike, any unfortunate foe whose scent is caught is sure to meet a quick and agonising end.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

Campaign movement range: +20%
	(when not embedded)
Hero action success chance: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Ringing across miles, the blood curdling cry leaves knees knocking and hands shaking.

effects.description:
Enemy weapon strength: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

Enemy missile strength: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Wounds sealing up as quickly as they are open, muscles pumping with unearthly abandon.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +3%
Speed: +3%
Casualty replenishment rate: +6%
Speed: +6%
Casualty replenishment rate: +10%
Speed: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The thirst for rended flesh further fuels the Skin Wolf's unnatural healing abilities.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +3%
Melee attack: +3
Casualty replenishment rate: +6%
Melee attack: +6
Casualty replenishment rate: +10%
Melee attack: +10

skillTree.localised_description: For this one prays nightly with at his altar of blood.

effects.description:
Enemy melee defence: -2
	(enemy characters in region)
Enable contact effect: "Bonecrusher"

skillTree.localised_description: A transformation so horrific, the very air grows thick with evil, protecting the advancing force of ruin.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 2%
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: While these slathering beasts don't exactly communicate with each other, they most certainly know how to follow the biggest and bloodiest in the pack.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +2 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +2 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +4 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +3 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Bits of gore left sloughing off and stinking terrify the enemy cavalry, encouraging the wolves to give chase.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: +2% for cavalry units
	(enemy armies in region)

Speed: +3% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Marauder Chariot and Kurgan Horsemen units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: +4% for cavalry units
	(enemy armies in region)

Speed: +6% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Marauder Chariot and Kurgan Horsemen units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: +6% for cavalry units
	(enemy armies in region)

Speed: +10% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Marauder Chariot and Kurgan Horsemen units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The instinct to scratch their claws against passing rocks ends up grinding their claws into fearsome points.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: -2
	(enemy armies in region)
Enable contact effect: "Bleed"

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

Control: -1
	(enemy local province)

Control: +1
	(own local province)

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

effects.description: Assassinate action: Additional 3% success chance
Assassinate action: Additional 8% success chance
Assassinate action: Additional 15% success chance

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -10%
Hero action success chance: +1%
Hero action cost: -20%
Hero action success chance: +3%
Hero action cost: -40%
Hero action success chance: +6%

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

items.colour_text: This ancient, yellowed canine tooth is the sacred talisman of lordship among Beorg’s tribe, warding off blows that would otherwise harm its wearer.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 25%
Ability: "Bear Fang Talisman"

Physical resistance: 5% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, Marauder Bearmen and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Control: -1
	(enemy local province)

Control: +1
	(own local province)
When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: From the day Beorg received the Gift of the Were, singled out by the Dark Gods to lead his people, all the North would come to know that glorious carnage would follow.
